commit.message: Spell out what is checked by each test instead of using the word "correct"

Update test/jdk/java/util/zip/ZipOutputStream/CloseWrappedStream.java

Remove extra whitespace

Co-authored-by: Andrey Turbanov <turbanoff@gmail.com>
Add more extensive testing of combined write/close failure modes
Don't suppress if finishException is null, mark stream as closed even when closing the wrapped stream failed
Prevent IOException thrown during finish() from being lost if an IOException is thrown while closing the wrapped stream
Add a sanity check that the wrapped stream is closed for the normal case where the wrapped stream does not throw during flushing
Make DeflaterOutputStream.close close its wrapped output stream even if finish() fails
